title: Banks, NBFCs well placed to seize opportunity from India's strong economic prospects: ICRA
description: Loan growth is expected to moderate over the next year as banks seek to align their loan growth in line with deposits, as deposits are not growing as fast as loans. Loan growth will reduce to 12% -14%, from 16% last year.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
